participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, Emily is passionate about justice and dreams of making a difference as a lawyer.
participant_1.background: my family has raised horses for generations. i dream of moving to the city. i'm from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm. i want to be a lawyer.

participant_2.name: David Cohen
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, David loves to challenge himself and enjoys reading as a way to escape into different worlds.
participant_2.background: i was raised in a single parent household. i only eat kosher. i am a stunt double as my second job. i read twenty books a year.
